SELECT *
,sqrt(POWER((#{page.searchMap.lng}-t1.lng),2)+POWER((#{page.searchMap.lat}-t1.lat),2)) AS juli
FROM release_activity t1
WHERE 1=1 and t1.type = 1
AND t1.activitycategory = #{page.searchMap.categoryId}
AND t1.starttime BETWEEN #{page.searchMap.st} AND #{page.searchMap.et}
AND #{page.searchMap.l} <=(t1.outtime - t1.starttime)
AND t1.city IN (SELECT c.code FROM city c WHERE c.codycity = #{page.searchMap.baiduCode})
AND t1.city IN (SELECT c.code FROM city c LEFT JOIN city cc ON cc.countryCode = c.countryCode WHERE c.codycity = #{page.searchMap.baiduCode})
AND t1.city Not IN (SELECT c.code FROM city c LEFT JOIN city cc ON cc.countryCode = c.countryCode WHERE c.codycity = #{page.searchMap.baiduCode})
AND t1.city IN (SELECT c.code FROM city c WHERE c.codycity = #{page.searchMap.baiduCode})
AND t1.Id IN (SELECT t2.sponsorld FROM activity_registration t2 WHERE t2.myld IN( SELECT t3.id FROM user t3 WHERE t3.sex = 1 ))
AND t1.sponsorid = 1
ORDER BY juli ASC
